about_the_game:
Music created for and used in Robolife2-Nova Duty
You may find other BGM in Robolife Original Soundtrack

All music tracks from the game are included in WAV format.

Notice
Only absolute music (instrumental) are include in this original sound track. (The BGM for church is not count)
The music with lyrics are belong and created by another musician - Maou Tamashi (魔王魂)
Those contents will not be in this application.
